section.section: A Class C beer license shall be issued by the local licensing authority of the county in which the place of business is located. The holder of the license may keep for sale and sell beer at retail to bona fide members and their guests, at any club, at the place described in the license for consumption on the premises only.
The annual fee for the license shall be paid to the local collecting agent before any license is issued, for distribution as provided.
In Allegany County the annual license fee is $150.
Beer sold pursuant to this license may be consumed on the premises or elsewhere.

text.section: This section does not apply in Anne Arundel County.
This section does not apply in Baltimore City.
This section does not apply in Baltimore County.
In Calvert County the annual license fee is $50.
In Caroline County the annual license fee is $250.
In Carroll County the annual license fee is $50.
In Cecil County the annual license fee is $75.
This section does not apply in Charles County.
In Dorchester County the annual license fee is $250.
In Frederick County the annual license fee is $50.
This section does not apply in Garrett County.
This section does not apply in Harford County.

section.section: In Howard County the annual license fee is $25.
The license shall be issued only to a club composed exclusively:

At least 75 percent of the members of the club shall have resided in Howard County for at least 2 years immediately preceding the date of the application for the license. The club shall also have maintained a post in the county for at least 3 years immediately preceding the date of the application.

text.section: This section does not apply in Kent County.
In Montgomery County the annual license fee is $50.
In Prince George's County the annual license fee is $245.

section.section: In Queen Anne's County the annual license fee is $50.
The license shall be issued to any local unit of a nationwide bona fide nonprofit organization or club:
The license shall be issued only to a bona fide yacht club, golf club, fraternal club or order, country club, social or recreational club:

text.section: This section does not apply in St. Mary's County.
In Somerset County the annual license fee is $32.

section.section: In Talbot County the annual license fee is $25.
Section 18-101 of this article permits the Talbot County Council to provide for the retail alcoholic beverage laws for the county which, if enacted, supersede the provisions of this article.

text.section: In Washington County the annual license fee is $100.
In Wicomico County the annual license fee is $75.

section.section: In Worcester County the annual license fee is $150.
The hours for sale shall be as provided in § 11-524 of this article.
